title: Medicare Made Clear 2021: All you Need to Know When Turning 65 or Retiring
description: Medicare is crazy complicated, right?! Why do they want to treat us like children when we finally get to the age where we look to simplify our lives?We now turn 65 or retire and here comes Medicare! Medicare is actually GREAT health insurance but now we have to dedicate all of our free time just to understand our choices. Afterall â€“ God forbid we mess this up!I have put this book together to help simplify the decisions that need to be made. I even included interactive videos that you can click on, and watch me explain your choices.
author: Keith Armbrecht
